title: At the Corner of Thunder and Lightning
description: It was a dark and stormy night at the port where the cruise ship landed. The Detective decided to go into town to find a good, stiff drink. What he actually found was a corpse. So much for that drink.

personList.name: Bartender Bob
personList.description: The Detective was planning on seeing this guy. He'd just hoped to be asking for a drink instead of an alibi.

personList.name: Barista Bailey
personList.description: She keeps offering an Irish Coffee. The Detective doesn't think he should accept.

personList.name: Cab-driver Carl
personList.description: He only accepts cash and never seems to have customers, yet he's always running around.

personList.name: Watch-seller Wesley
personList.description: He has the time of death. You can have it for a price.

weaponList.name: Poisoned Coffee
weaponList.description: The coffee smells delicious, but best not to drink it.

weaponList.name: Glass Bottle
weaponList.description: It may have been filled with a delicious drink at some point. Now it's just good for bludgeoning.

weaponList.name: Yellow Car
weaponList.description: There's a phone number on the side, a dent in the front, and an oddly hearse-like hump in the back.

weaponList.name: Knife
weaponList.description: Small, simple, and silent. As murder weapons go, it's a classic.

locationList.name: Sidewalk
locationList.description: The cracks here might break more than just yo mama's back.

locationList.name: Alleyway
locationList.description: Grease, grime, and garbage cover everything back here.

locationList.name: Street Lamp
locationList.description: If you want to make sure you're seen, you better believe this is the place to be.

locationList.name: Crosswalk
locationList.description: Paint stripes and sideswipes meet in this little patch of danger.

motiveList.name: To keep a family recipe secret

cluesList: Blue eyes were reflected in a blade.
The shortest suspect had a candy wrapper on their shoe.
The person who wanted to rob the victim was crossing the street.
Whoever was having an affair was the most visible.
Bartender Bob had finished his drink.
Someone in the 5' range was seen in the alleyway.
The person who wanted to rob the victim apparently wanted them caffeinated too.
A metal weapon was found on the sidewalk.
A Taurus knew a secret family recipe.
The corpse had yellow paint flecks on it.

correctSolution.motive: To keep a family recipe secret
